definition: to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)

sentences.english: Men often overlook their ears during their regular grooming session.
sentences.chinese: 男人们在日常装扮中经常会忽视掉耳朵。

sentences.english: But plants for this vertical landscape must be chosen with care.
sentences.chinese: 但是装扮这个立体景观的植物必须小心选择。

sentences.english: He spruced up the chairs with new slipcovers.
sentences.chinese: 他用新围布把椅子装扮漂亮。

sentences.english: They are often more comfortable and more durable than civilian clothes.
sentences.chinese: 还可以减税，制服更比素人装扮舒服和耐穿。

sentences.english: Mimes , in the form of God on high.
sentences.chinese: 装扮成上帝的一群小丑。

sentences.english: The garb was presented to Obama by elders in Wajir.
sentences.chinese: 这身装扮是瓦基的一位老人家送给奥巴马的。

sentences.english: YL: I would rather say it's a cross-gender image.
sentences.chinese: 我其实更倾向于认为这是一种混淆性别的装扮。

sentences.english: Favorite clothes: Students wear, ladies wear, urban fashion dress.
sentences.chinese: 学生装，淑女装，都市时尚装扮。

sentences.english: We want to buy Scarves, Stoles, Pareos and Made-Ups, Shawls.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购围巾，女用坎肩，海滩裙和装扮，披肩。

sentences.english: He appropriately opted for Wellington boots and fisherman pants while fishing on the River Dee with the Duchess of Cornwall.
sentences.chinese: 在梯河钓鱼时，王储夫妇选择了渔夫渔妇的装扮。

sentences.english: The fluid drop shape gives any outfit a hint of romance. Why not combine it with the matching earrings?
sentences.chinese: 而线条流丽的水滴形坠饰，则为装扮注入浪漫气息。

sentences.english: It was just like St. Patrick's Day.
sentences.chinese: 就好像是圣帕特里克节时的装扮。

sentences.english: Dressing the part on a tour of the Rainforest area of Tacantins State, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在巴西塔康地区的热带丛林旅行中的装扮。

sentences.english: An enthusiast dressed as a warrior pretends to be slain.
sentences.chinese: 一个战士装扮的“黑斯廷斯战役”迷假装战死。

sentences.english: Yang two knives for seven sister something up.
sentences.chinese: 杨二刀为七妹装扮一番。

sentences.english: I got some photos of them primping him.
sentences.chinese: 幸福女士照到了他们重新装扮他的照片。

definition: to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
variant of 裝扮|装扮[zhuang1 ban4]
whole body/from head to toe/single person/a suit of clothes
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
(Tw) to wear selected items of clothing in combination to achieve a particular look/fashion styling
